mapper.select: select concat('R',DATE_FORMAT(#{inputDate},"%y%m%d"),#{itemCode}, lpad(A.LotNo,'4',0)) from ( SELECT if(ifnull(max(right(LM_LotNo,4)),0) = '9999', 1, ifnull(max(right(LM_LotNo,4)),0)+1) LotNo FROM LotMaster_tbl where left(LM_LotNo,13) = concat('R',DATE_FORMAT(#{inputDate},"%y%m%d"),#{itemCode}) ) A
SELECT concat('N', DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%y%m%d"), #{itemCode}, lpad(matarial_No,'4',0)) from LotNo_tbl

select concat('N',DATE_FORMAT(#{inputDate},"%y%m%d"),#{itemCode}, lpad(A.LotNo,'4',0)) from ( SELECT if(ifnull(max(right(CL_LotNo,4)),0) = '9999', 1, ifnull(max(right(CL_LotNo,4)),0)+1) LotNo FROM Crate_Lot_tbl where left(CL_LotNo,13) = concat('N',DATE_FORMAT(#{inputDate},"%y%m%d"),#{itemCode}) ) A
SELECT concat('S', DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%y%m%d"), #{itemCode}, lpad(matarial_No,'4',0)) from LotNo_tbl
SELECT concat('L', DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%y%m%d"), #{itemCode}, lpad(matarial_No,'4',0)) from LotNo_tbl
mapper.update: update LotNo_tbl set pre_matarial_No = (case when matarial_No = 9999 then matarial_No else pre_matarial_No end), matarial_No = (case when matarial_No = 9999 then 1 else matarial_No+1 end)
